TopicTitle: 1.0.5 Cannot engage SAS "No Pilots" with Jeb sitting there

Articles.Content:
In a small rocket with a command module and Jeb, when I tried to activate SAS, I was told there was "No active SAA module or pilot.

Edited November 10, 2015 by Balrog

Since this is for modded installs, anyone who would like to help would need to know which mods you are using.

Try making a screenshot from your gamedata folder?

I had the same problem... I removed all mods I had and reinstalled them one by one. So in my case it was KTwitter, after removing it everything works fine so far.

KSP: 1.0.5 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

Ferram Aerospace Research - 0.15.5.2

Kerbal Construction Time - 1.2.3

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

ModularFlightIntegrator - 1.1.2

StageRecovery - 1.5.8

TextureReplacer - 2.4

Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.4

Transfer Window Planner - 1.3.1

USI-LS - 0.1.4
